channel.title: W3C Service Workers Working Group-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Service Workers Working Group

item.title: [service-workers-1, push-api] Issue with "ServiceWorkerRegistration": description for updateViaCache is missing
item.content:encoded:
MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ServiceWorkerRegistration

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

The property updateViaCache is only available in the compatability table, but is nowhere described.

Specific section or headline?

updateViaCache

What did you expect to see?

An explaination on the property updateViaCache

Did you test this? If so, how?

MDN Content page report details
  • Folder: en-us/web/api/serviceworkerregistration
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ServiceWorkerRegistration
  • GitHub URL: https://github.com/mdn/content/blob/main/files/en-us/web/api/serviceworkerregistration/index.html
  • Last commit: 642d6eb
  • Document last modified: 2021-06-17T03:52:55.000Z
